property.name: Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
notes
property.value: Tiberian Conquest mod for TripleA, the European war theatre, by Fei. Assets based off unit cameos from C&C3 developped by EALA. Many thanks to Wisconsin and Veqryn for support on the official TripleA forums!
